patthana16.87:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.87:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.87:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.87:4.6: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.87:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
